name: Hanky Pancreas Gift Card "Hanky Holidays"
description:
Hanky Holidays!

Want to get your pump-wieldin' loved one a Hanky Pancreas gift but aren't sure what? The Hanky Pancreas Gift Card is for you! 

You will be emailed a one-time use gift card code along with a high resolution image to download, print, cut & fold. You could forward along digitally, if you're not into the arts & crafts.

$20, $40, $60, $80 and $100 cards available.

name: Hanky Wrap - Coral - Fabric Backorder!
description:
***Supplier just notified there is a backorder of this fabric!***

An ultra soft and versatile wrap that you will hold dear to your heart (and plastic pancreas)! 

This wrap has a special sewn-in pocket made to hold the insulin pump. Simply slide the pump in the pocket and place where you normally wear it, tuck it in your bra, or let it hang. Easy to dress up or down.

How To Wear:
- Tie it around your neck and tuck pocket in bra 
- Tie it around your waist and tuck pocket in pants/pocket

Features: 
- Lightweight high quality rayon lycra (mmm mmm soft)
- Micromesh pocket front for button and touchscreen accessibility
- Neoprene pocket backing for protection and shock absorption
- Individually handmade in USA by designer Jessica Floeh 
- Strategic tassel draping for device counterbalance; “pump-lump” camouflage

name: Hoop'n Bolus - Mint
description:
The Hoop'n Bolus is a simple band that wraps around your device and quickly transforms it into a cute floral accessory to your outfit.

This is best for ladies who wear the pump clipped to their waistbands, but hey what's stopping you from clipping it anywhere else!

Yipee!

Elastic band + Neoprene base + Chiffon Petals = Your pump's bestie.

name: Weave Sleeve™ (Scarf Add-On)
description: * SCARF NOT INCLUDED The Weave Sleeve™ transforms almost any medium to light-weight scarf into a Hanky Pancreas™ accessory! One side of this is three strips of elastic to weave your scarf through on top of Neoprene to help keep your device more safe. The other side is see-through chiffon so that you can still see your buttons. See a prototype in action here:
